name: Lithic Guard
description: Grant the character to which this is attached a Shield that scales off the number of Liyue characters.
descriptionraw: Grant the character to which this is attached a $[K6] that scales off the number of Liyue characters.
descriptionreplaced: Grant the character to which this is attached a {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> that scales off the number of Liyue characters.
